title: Similarity between Qing and Russian empires

content.prompt: Which of the following describes an accurate similarity between the Qing and Russian empires in the eighteenth and nineteenth centuries?

choices.label: Both relied heavily on maritime trade as a source of material goods.
Both successfully resisted pressure from industrialized powers.
Both were heavily influenced by the intellectual work of Jesuit missionaries.
Both had vast territories with peoples of various ethnicities and languages.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
